text: "Killed by Death" is a 1984 song by British heavy metal band Motörhead. It was taken from their compilation album No Remorse. It went to number 51 in the United Kingdom. The song was not on any of their studio albums. It is on their 1984 compilation album. ==Track listing== All tracks written by Lemmy, Würzel, Phil Campbell and Pete Gill. == References == Category:1984 songs Category:Motörhead songs Category:Heavy metal
title: Killed by Death (song)
